channel.title: Help needed about basic coding
channel.description: I know what codes are and i got a few bookmarked pages about the language of java and what not incase i need it, i get stumpted alot, but anyway, when people create and share codes, where do they put them to take affect? do i compile after i edit things?while were on the topic do you think you can give me a easy one so i can test it? :D id love that

item.title: Help needed about basic coding

lol fourtunately i just searched my whole comp for the word client and got it, but thanks. Good luck to you too

item.title: Help needed about basic coding

item.description:
@butnugget wrote:

if you have a source it should say cleint in a notpad |=| kinda looks like that… and should be by the top of the folder… good luck man

item.title: Help needed about basic coding
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

thanks ill take in that advice and hopefully learn from it, i cant imagine editing for 2 days then some error just makes it all invalid…=’[ and this might be a stupid question but how do i get to client.java? please be specific im stupid ;d

item.title: Help needed about basic coding
item.dc:creator: @butnugget butnugget
item.description:
@butnugget wrote:

yes you compile everything after you edit… but make sure you make a backup because i screwed myself 2 days ago about 2 days worth of work… this is a tut on gllobal objects where you can put any object anyplace http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=2521 and this is a tut on adding npcs http://www.sythe.org/showthread.php?t=154994 i hope ive helped you and … good luck man…
